Java	B-MISC	B-MISC

WASHINGTON	O	B-LOC
1996-08-28	O	O

The	O	O
Securities	O	B-ORG
and	O	I-ORG

Commission	O	I-ORG
Wednesday	O	O
approved	O	O
rules	O	O
designed	O	O
to	O	O
give	O	O
stock	O	O
market	O	O
investors	O	O
a	O	O
better	O	O
chance	O	O
at	O	O
getting	O	O
the	O	O
best	O	O
price	O	O
available	O	O
for	O	O
their	O	O
orders	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
so-called	O	O
order	O	O
handling	O	O
rules	O	O
,	O	O
which	O	O
were	O	O
proposed	O	O
last	O	O

The	O	O

require	O	O
specialists	O	O
at	O	O
stock	O	O
exchanges	O	O
and	O	O

on	O	O
Nasdaq	O	B-MISC
to	O	O

and	O	O
market	O	O
makers	O	O
are	O	O
companies	O	O

as	O	O

to	O	O

as	O	O
opposed	O	O
to	O	O
a	O	O
market	O	O
order	O	O
executed	O	O
at	O	O

.	O	O

in	O	O
Atlanta	O	B-LOC
in	O	O
July	O	O
.	O	O

qualified	O	O

second	O	O
place	O	O
,	O	O
also	O	O

his	O	O
old	O	O
record	O	O
in	O	O
4:17.696	O	O
.	O	O

"	O	O

was	O	O
very	O	O
nervous	O	O

,	O	O
28	O	O

.	O	O

hurdles	O	O
must	O	O
be	O	O
overcome	O	O
before	O	O
the	O	O
method	O	O
is	O	O
used	O	O
in	O	O
human	O	O
trials	O	O
.	O	O

Nevertheless	O	O
,	O	O
"	O	O
a	O	O
treatment	O	O
based	O	O
on	O	O
the	O	O
new	O	O
strategy	O	O
....	O	O
may	O	O
have	O	O
the	O	O
potential	O	O
to	O	O
benefit	O	O
many	O	O
patients	O	O
,	O	O
"	O	O
the	O	O
University	O	B-ORG
of	O	I-ORG
Pennsylvania	O	I-ORG
Medical	O	O
Centre	O	O
said	O	O
in	O	O
a	O	O
release	O	O
.	O	O

Muscular	O	O
dystrophy	O	O
is	O	O
a	O	O
fatal	O	O
illness	O	O
in	O	O
which	O	O
the	O	O
body	O	O
's	O	O
muscle	O	O
tissue	O	O
degenerates	O	O
and	O	O
is	O	O
replaced	O	O
by	O	O
fat	O	O
.	O	O

Death	O	O
strikes	O	O
in	O	O
early	O	O
adulthood	O	O
.	O	O

Individuals	O	O
with	O	O
the	O	O
disease	O	O
have	O	O
a	O	O
non-working	O	O
version	O	O
of	O	O
a	O	O
gene	O	O
responsible	O	O
for	O	O
producing	O	O
a	O	O
crucial	O	O
muscle	O	O
protein	O	O
called	O	O
dystrophin	O	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
the	O	O
study	O	O
at	O	O
the	O	O
University	O	O
's	O	O
Institute	O	B-ORG
for	O	I-ORG
Human	O	I-ORG
Gene	O	I-ORG
Therapy	O	I-ORG
,	O	O
researchers	O	O
altered	O	O
a	O	O
common-cold	O	O
virus	O	O
to	O	O
carry	O	O
a	O	O
version	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
working	O	O
dystrophin	O	O
gene	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
virus	O	O
,	O	O
which	O	O
also	O	O
was	O	O
altered	O	O
to	O	O
minimise	O	O
its	O	O
susceptibility	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
immune	O	O
system	O	O
,	O	O
was	O	O
then	O	O
injected	O	O
into	O	O
the	O	O
muscle	O	O
cells	O	O
of	O	O
mice	O	O
bred	O	O
to	O	O
lack	O	O
dystrophin	O	O
genes	O	O
.	O	O

In	O	O
the	O	O
experiment	O	O
,	O	O
between	O	O
30	O	O
to	O	O
40	O	O
percent	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
muscle	O	O
fibers	O	O
in	O	O
one	O	O
group	O	O
of	O	O
mice	O	O
produced	O	O
dystrophin	O	O
for	O	O
two	O	O
weeks	O	O
before	O	O
diminishing	O	O
.	O	O

Similar	O	O
results	O	O
had	O	O
been	O	O
obtained	O	O
previously	O	O
in	O	O
test-tube	O	O
cell	O	O
cultures	O	O
,	O	O
but	O	O
not	O	O
in	O	O
live	O	O
animals	O	O
,	O	O
the	O	O
university	O	O
said	O	O
.	O	O

The	O	O
university	O	O
said	O	O
methods	O	O
are	O	O
still	O	O
needed	O	O
to	O	O
make	O	O
enough	O	O
of	O	O
the	O	O
altered	O	O
virus	O	O
to	O	O
treat	O	O
humans	O	O
,	O	O
to	O	O
further	O	O
decrease	O	O
the	O	O
immune-system	O	O
response	O	O
to	O	O
the	O	O
virus	O	O
,	O	O
and	O	O
to	O	O
deliver	O	O
the	O	O
virus	O	O
to	O	O
human	O	O
muscle	O	O
